article_title: ResCap Sues Bank of America, Royal Bank of Canada, Others Over Bad Loans
article_text:
Residential Capital LLC is suing Bank of America Corp., Royal Bank of Canada and other financial institutions that sold the mortgage servicer the bad loans that helped tip it into bankruptcy two years ago.

In a dozen similarly worded lawsuits filed Tuesday with U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Manhattan, ResCap said its business success relied on the quality of the loans it bought from the banks and mortgage lenders.
